scripts.build:wasm-mt: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals" rustup run nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg-parallel -- --features parallel -Z build-std=panic_abort,std
scripts.web: webpack build ./index.js --mode production -o dist --output-filename index.js && shx cp index.html dist/&&shx cp test.png dist/&&shx cp vercel.json dist/
